verses.verse: It happened, <S%H1961><s%> that when Isaac <S%H3327><s%> was old, <S%H2204><s%> and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> were dim, <S%H3543><s%> so that he could not see, <S%H7200><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> his elder <S%H1419><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H1121><s%> "My son?" He said to him, <S%H559><s%> "Here I am."
He said, <S%H559><s%> "See now, <S%H2204><s%> I am old. I don't <S%H3045><s%> know the day <S%H3117><s%> of my death. <S%H4194><s%>

Now therefore, <S%H5375><s%> please take your weapons, <S%H3627><s%> your quiver <S%H8522><s%> and your bow, <S%H7198><s%> and go out <S%H3318><s%> to the field, <S%H7704><s%> and take <S%H6679><s%> me venison. <S%H6718><s%>

Make <S%H6213><s%> me savory food, <S%H4303><s%> such as <S%H834><s%> I love, <S%H157><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> it to me, <S%H398><s%> that I may eat, and that my soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> you before <S%H2962><s%> I die. <S%H4191><s%>"

Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> when Isaac <S%H3327><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Esau <S%H6215><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to the field <S%H7704><s%> to hunt <S%H6679><s%> for venison, <S%H6718><s%> and to bring it. <S%H935><s%>

Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> her son, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H8085><s%> I heard your father <S%H1><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to Esau <S%H6215><s%> your brother, <S%H251><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

<S%H935><s%> 'Bring me venison, <S%H6718><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> me savory food, <S%H4303><s%> that I may eat, <S%H398><s%> and bless <S%H1288><s%> you before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> my death. <S%H4194><s%>'
Now therefore, <S%H1121><s%> my son, obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> according to that which <S%H834><s%> I command you. <S%H6680><s%>

Go <S%H3212><s%> now to the flock, <S%H6629><s%> and get <S%H3947><s%> me from there two <S%H8147><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> young <S%H2896><s%> goats. <S%H5795><s%> I will make <S%H6213><s%> them savory food <S%H4303><s%> for your father, <S%H1><s%> such as he loves. <S%H157><s%>
You shall bring <S%H935><s%> it to your father, <S%H1><s%> that he may eat, <S%H398><s%> so that <S%H834><s%> he may bless <S%H1288><s%> you before <S%H6440><s%> his death. <S%H4194><s%>"

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his mother, <S%H517><s%> "Behold, <S%H6215><s%> Esau my brother <S%H251><s%> is a hairy <S%H8163><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> and I am a smooth <S%H2509><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>

What if my father <S%H1><s%> touches me? <S%H4959><s%> I will seem <S%H5869><s%> to him as a deceiver, <S%H8591><s%> and I would bring <S%H935><s%> a curse <S%H7045><s%> on myself, <S%H1293><s%> and not a blessing."

His mother <S%H517><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H7045><s%> "Let your curse be on me, <S%H1121><s%> my son. Only obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice, <S%H6963><s%> and go <S%H3212><s%> get them for me. <S%H3947><s%>"

He went, <S%H3212><s%> and got <S%H3947><s%> them, <S%H935><s%> and brought them to his mother. <S%H517><s%> His mother <S%H517><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> savory food, <S%H4303><s%> such as his father <S%H1><s%> loved. <S%H157><s%>

Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the good <S%H2532><s%> clothes <S%H899><s%> of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> her elder <S%H1419><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> which were with her in the house, <S%H1004><s%> and put them on <S%H3847><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> her younger <S%H6996><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>
She put <S%H3847><s%> the skins <S%H5785><s%> of the young <S%H1423><s%> goats <S%H5795><s%> on his hands, <S%H3027><s%> and on the smooth <S%H2513><s%> of his neck. <S%H6677><s%>
She gave <S%H5414><s%> the savory food <S%H4303><s%> and the bread, <S%H3899><s%> which she had prepared, <S%H6213><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of her son <S%H1121><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
He came <S%H935><s%> to his father, <S%H1><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "My father? <S%H1><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "Here I am. <S%H1121><s%> Who are you, my son?"

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his father, <S%H1><s%> "I am Esau <S%H6215><s%> your firstborn. <S%H1060><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> what you asked <S%H1696><s%> me to do. <S%H6965><s%> Please arise, sit <S%H3427><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> of my venison, <S%H6718><s%> that your soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless me. <S%H1288><s%>"

Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his son, <S%H1121><s%> "How is it that you have found <S%H4672><s%> it so quickly, <S%H4116><s%> my son? <S%H1121><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "Because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gave me <S%H6440><s%> success. <S%H7136><s%>"

Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> "Please come near, <S%H5066><s%> that I may feel <S%H4184><s%> you, <S%H1121><s%> my son, whether you are really <S%H2088><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> Esau or not. <S%H6215><s%>"

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went near <S%H5066><s%> to Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father. <S%H1><s%> He felt <S%H4959><s%> him, <S%H559><s%> and said, "The voice <S%H6963><s%> is Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s voice, <S%H6963><s%> but the hands <S%H3027><s%> are the hands <S%H3027><s%> of Esau. <S%H6215><s%>"

He didn't <S%H5234><s%> recognize him, <S%H3027><s%> because his hands were hairy, <S%H8163><s%> like his brother, <S%H251><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%>'s hands. <S%H3027><s%> So he blessed him. <S%H1288><s%>
He said, <S%H559><s%> "Are you really my son <S%H1121><s%> Esau? <S%H6215><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "I am."

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Bring it near <S%H5066><s%> to me, <S%H398><s%> and I will eat of my son <S%H1121><s%>'s venison, <S%H6718><s%> that my soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> you. <S%H5066><s%>" He brought it near to him, <S%H398><s%> and he ate. He brought <S%H935><s%> him wine, <S%H3196><s%> and he drank. <S%H8354><s%>
His father <S%H1><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H5066><s%> "Come near now, <S%H5401><s%> and kiss me, <S%H1121><s%> my son."

He came near, <S%H5066><s%> and kissed <S%H5401><s%> him. <S%H7306><s%> He smelled the smell <S%H7381><s%> of his clothing, <S%H899><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> him, <S%H559><s%> and said, "Behold, <S%H7200><s%> the smell <S%H7381><s%> of my son <S%H1121><s%> is as the smell <S%H7381><s%> of a field <S%H7704><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has blessed. <S%H1288><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> you of the dew <S%H2919><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> of the fatness <S%H4924><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and plenty <S%H7230><s%> of grain <S%H1715><s%> and new wine. <S%H8492><s%>

Let peoples <S%H5971><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> you, <S%H3816><s%> and nations bow down <S%H7812><s%> to you. <S%H1933><s%> Be lord <S%H1376><s%> over your brothers. <S%H251><s%> Let your mother <S%H517><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> bow down <S%H7812><s%> to you. <S%H779><s%> Cursed be everyone who curses <S%H779><s%> you. <S%H1288><s%> Blessed be everyone who blesses you. <S%H1288><s%>"

It happened, <S%H3327><s%> as soon as Isaac had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of blessing <S%H1288><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> had just <S%H389><s%> gone <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> that Esau <S%H6215><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> from his hunting. <S%H6718><s%>

He also made <S%H6213><s%> savory food, <S%H4303><s%> and brought it <S%H935><s%> to his father. <S%H1><s%> He said <S%H559><s%> to his father, <S%H1><s%> "Let my father <S%H1><s%> arise, <S%H6965><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> of his son <S%H1121><s%>'s venison, <S%H6718><s%> that your soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless me. <S%H1288><s%>"
Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H559><s%> "Who are you?" He said, "I am your son, <S%H1121><s%> your firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> Esau. <S%H6215><s%>"

Isaac <S%H3327><s%> trembled <S%H2729><s%> violently, <S%H3966><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Who, <S%H645><s%> then, <S%H6679><s%> is he who has taken venison, <S%H6718><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> it me, <S%H398><s%> and I have eaten of all before you came, <S%H935><s%> and have blessed <S%H1288><s%> him? <S%H1288><s%> Yes, he will be blessed."

When Esau <S%H6215><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of his father, <S%H1><s%> he cried <S%H6817><s%> with an exceeding <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and bitter <S%H4751><s%> cry, <S%H6818><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to his father, <S%H1><s%> "Bless <S%H1288><s%> me, <S%H1><s%> even me also, my father."
He said, <S%H559><s%> "Your brother <S%H251><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with deceit, <S%H4820><s%> and has taken away <S%H3947><s%> your blessing. <S%H1293><s%>"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Isn't <S%H3588><s%> he rightly named <S%H7121><s%> Jacob? <S%H3290><s%> For he has supplanted me <S%H6117><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> two times. <S%H6471><s%> He took away <S%H3947><s%> my birthright. <S%H1062><s%> See, <S%H3947><s%> now he has taken away my blessing. <S%H1293><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "Haven't <S%H680><s%> you reserved a blessing for me? <S%H1293><s%>"

Isaac <S%H3327><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Esau, <S%H6215><s%> "Behold, <S%H559><s%> I have made <S%H7760><s%> him your lord, <S%H1376><s%> and all his brothers <S%H251><s%> have I given <S%H5414><s%> to him for servants. <S%H5650><s%> With grain <S%H1715><s%> and new wine <S%H8492><s%> have I sustained <S%H5564><s%> him. <S%H6213><s%> What then will I do for <S%H645><s%> you, <S%H1121><s%> my son?"

Esau <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his father, <S%H1><s%> "Have you but one <S%H259><s%> blessing, <S%H1293><s%> my father? <S%H1><s%> Bless <S%H1288><s%> me, <S%H1><s%> even me also, my father." Esau <S%H6215><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and wept. <S%H1058><s%>

Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> him, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, of the fatness <S%H4924><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> will be your dwelling, <S%H4186><s%> and of the dew <S%H2919><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> from above. <S%H5920><s%>

By your sword <S%H2719><s%> will you live, <S%H2421><s%> and you will serve <S%H5647><s%> your brother. <S%H251><s%> It will happen, <S%H6561><s%> when you will break loose, <S%H7300><s%> that you shall shake his yoke <S%H5923><s%> from off your neck. <S%H6677><s%>"

Esau <S%H6215><s%> hated <S%H7852><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of the blessing <S%H1293><s%> with <S%H834><s%> which his father <S%H1><s%> blessed him. <S%H1288><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> "The days <S%H3117><s%> of mourning <S%H60><s%> for my father <S%H1><s%> are at hand. <S%H7126><s%> Then I will kill <S%H2026><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>"

The words <S%H1697><s%> of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> her elder <S%H1419><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> were told <S%H5046><s%> to Rebekah. <S%H7259><s%> She sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> her younger <S%H6996><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H251><s%> "Behold, your brother Esau <S%H6215><s%> comforts <S%H5162><s%> himself about you by planning to kill you. <S%H2026><s%>
Now therefore, <S%H1121><s%> my son, obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice. <S%H6963><s%> Arise, <S%H6965><s%> flee <S%H1272><s%> to Laban, <S%H3837><s%> my brother, <S%H251><s%> in Haran. <S%H2771><s%>
Stay <S%H3427><s%> with him a few <S%H259><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> until <S%H834><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>'s fury <S%H2534><s%> turns away; <S%H7725><s%>

until your brother <S%H251><s%>'s anger <S%H639><s%> turn away <S%H7725><s%> from you, <S%H7911><s%> and he forgets what you have done <S%H6213><s%> to him. <S%H7971><s%> Then I will send, and get <S%H3947><s%> you from there. <S%H4100><s%> Why should I be bereaved <S%H7921><s%> of you both <S%H8147><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day? <S%H3117><s%>"

Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> "I am weary <S%H6973><s%> of my life <S%H2416><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Heth. <S%H2845><s%> If Jacob <S%H3290><s%> takes <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Heth, <S%H2845><s%> such as these, <S%H1323><s%> of the daughters of the land, <S%H776><s%> what good <S%H4100><s%> will my life do me? <S%H2416><s%>"
